import React,{useContext} from 'react' import "./Textinput.css" import {Data} from "../../context/Userdata" export default function Textinput() { const b = useContext(Data) console.log(b.githublink) let prp=b.githublink let setprp=b.setgithublink return (
{setprp(e.target.value);console.log(b.githublink)}}/>

It is optional to fill the links If you don't fill it then
it will not displayed on your original porfolio

) }
